definitions: Go to see and spend time with (someone) socially.
Go to see (a place) as a tourist or for some other purpose.
Go to stay with (someone) for a period of time.
Attend (a place, typically a church or school) regularly.
Come to or appear in (a place) temporarily.
Inflict (something harmful or unpleasant) on someone or something.
examples: She visits her grandmother every Sunday.
He visits museums when he travels.
The doctor visits patients at home.
A strange quietness visits the house.
